Element.Description: Charge Transaction Requests may only be modified in the context of a single Order. If the OrderHeaderKey is not passed, EnterpriseCode, DocumentType, and OrderNo must be passed to find the OrderHeaderKey.

Attribute.Name: DocumentType
Attribute.Description: The DocumentType of the Order. Must be passed with EnterpriseCode and OrderNo to find the order if OrderHeaderKey is not passed.

Attribute.Name: EnterpriseCode
Attribute.Description: The EnterpriseCode of the Order. Must be passed with DocumentType and OrderNo to find the order if OrderHeaderKey is not passed.

Attribute.Name: OrderNo
Attribute.Description: The OrderNo of the Order. Must be passed with EnterpriseCode and DocumentType to find the order if OrderHeaderKey is not passed.
